document_data.name: Halfling's Hand
document_data.usage: [[Poison]], drug{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20220221195407/http://www.candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_1112-04.htm| title = So Saith Ed Nov – Dec 2004| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Halfling's hand''', or '''oxhrel''' was a species of aquatic plant found in [[Faerûn]].
document_data.Description: Oxhrel resembled a lilypad plant grew in freshwater. The plant could be distilled into a special liquid that, when mixed with dried and powdered [[horseradish]], created a [[poison]] that caused violent convulsions when introduced into bloodstream.
